name: @paykit-sdk/cli
description: PayKit CLI for product setup and development

scripts.build:dev-app: rm -rf dist/dev-app && mkdir -p dist/dev-app && cd dev-app && npm run build && cp -r .next/standalone/. ../dist/dev-app && cp -r .next/static ../dist/dev-app/.next/static && cd .. && node scripts/create-prod-package.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf dist && npm run build:dev-app && npm run build:cli
